LanguageData.VV_ReedPlant.description: A tall, sturdy plant cultivated for its fibrous stalks. Jute grows moderately fast, yields a reliable harvest of raw fibers, and is valued for making textiles.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> While reeds can still thrive away from water, they do so at a 25% slower rate than if there is water within 6 tiles.
